BBEX3.A.PAB.EUR.CA.AC.A04: Exchange rates (comparable rates) for the euro in Panama / EUR 1 = PAB ...

General: The ECB's euro reference exchange rates for the US dollar. There is currency parity (1:1) with the US dollar. The US dollar is legal tender alongside the balboa, which is in circulation only in the form of coins.
Source: European Central Bank (ECB) Banco Nacional de Panama.
